items.title: Hydrogen Refuelling Station (HRS)
items.text: Enables on-demand hydrogen generation directly at or near hydrogen refuelling stations, eliminating the need for expensive storage and transportation, making hydrogen refuelling more cost-effective and efficient.

items.title: Critical Infrastructure
items.text: Delivers reliable, off-grid power to remote and essential infrastructure, ensuring sustainable and uninterrupted energy supply for critical operations. M2H2® Hydrogen Generator technology delivers on-demand hydrogen for power generation & reduces dependence on fossil fuels

items.title: Off-grid EV Charging Stations
items.text: Provides low-carbon, fast-charging solutions for electric vehicles by integrating M2H2® Hydrogen Generator technology with fuel cells, offering an eco-friendly alternative to conventional charging stations.

items.title: Green Steel Production
items.text: Facilitates the generation of green hydrogen from methanol directly at steel plants, enabling cost-effective production of green steel while significantly reducing carbon emissions.

items.title: Industrial Decarbonization
items.text: Offers an ideal solution for hard-to-abate industries by providing a clean hydrogen alternative, helping sectors like cement, chemicals, and manufacturing transition to sustainable operations.

items.title: Hydrogen-Powered Heavy Vehicles
items.text: Supports heavy-duty transport, including trucks, buses and ships, by generating onboard hydrogen from methanol, ensuring a practical and efficient fuel solution for long-haul and commercial transport.
